EmailTemplate.name: Notification about KRA Submission for Review
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: Completion of performance KRA for the current quarter is pending
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Goal__c.Resource__c},
This is a reminder that the completion of the Quarterly KRA for this evaluation period is still pending to submit for mentor review.
Please make sure to complete and submit your KRA to your mentor before 2 weeks to {!Goal__c.Quarter_End_Date__c}.
Please check here to access your KRA.
If you already submitted the KRA, please ignore this email.
For any further details on KRA please contact your mentor {!Goal__c.Check_In_By__c}.
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
